last_product_options.name: Wheelchair Ramp
last_product_options.title: Wheelchair Ramp – Strong & Lightweight | Anti-Slip Surface | Easy to Use | Portable & Foldable | Supports Safe Access
last_product_options.description: The Wheelchair Ramp is a high-strength aluminum, foldable, and lightweight mobility solution for easy access over steps and curbs. With a 300Kg weight capacity and non-slip surface, it ensures safety, durability, and convenience for all users.
last_product_options.features: High-Strength Aluminum Build: Lightweight yet durable design. 300Kg Weight Capacity: Ensures stability and safety. Foldable & Portable: Easy to transport and store. Non-Slip Surface: Provides secure traction in all conditions. Universal Compatibility: Suitable for wheelchairs, power chairs, and scooters.
last_product_options.why_choose: Superior Strength & Lightweight: High-quality aluminum for easy handling. Enhanced Safety: Anti-slip surface ensures grip in all conditions. Wide Compatibility: Works with all mobility aids. Space-Saving Design: Easily folds for compact storage. Versatile Use: Ideal for homes, offices, and public spaces.

last_product_options.name: Aarogyaa Bharat Multipurpose Tray For Wheelchair (RX904)

last_product_options.description: The Aarogyaa Bharat Multipurpose Tray For Wheelchair (RX904) is a durable, lightweight, and ergonomically designed tray that enhances mobility and convenience. Ideal for dining, reading, or working, it provides a stable surface with secure attachments, ensuring a comfortable and practical wheelchair experience.

last_product_options.name: Aarogyaa Bharat TPE Threshold Ramp (RX973/RX974/RX975/RX976)
last_product_options.title: Aarogyaa Bharat TPE Threshold Ramp (RX973/RX974/RX975/RX976) – Slip-Resistant | Strong & Weatherproof | Easy Setup | Multi-Purpose | Smooth Access
last_product_options.description: Enhance accessibility with a durable, anti-slip threshold ramp made from weather-resistant TPE. Ideal for wheelchairs, scooters, and trolleys, it features a seamless, no-drill design for easy installation and smooth transitions at doorways, curbs, and more. Available in multiple height options.
last_product_options.features: Secure Footing: Anti-slip grooved surface for enhanced grip. Durable & Weather-Resistant: Made from rust-proof TPE material for long-lasting use. Easy Installation: One-piece, no-drill design for hassle-free setup. Versatile Support: Compatible with wheelchairs, scooters, walkers, and trolleys. Smooth Access: Tapered edges for seamless multi-directional entry.
last_product_options.why_choose: Superior Durability: Made from high-quality TPE for long-lasting performance and wear resistance.     Hassle-Free Installation: One-piece solid construction requires no drilling or modifications.     Enhanced Safety: Anti-slip grooved surface provides extra grip in wet and dry conditions.     Universal Accessibility: Compatible with wheelchairs, scooters, trolleys, and pedestrian use.     Customizable Heights: Available in four height options to meet various accessibility needs.

Featuring memory foam, a breathable mesh cover, and universal compatibility, it offers long-lasting comfort and support for office chairs, car seats, wheelchairs, and more. Portable and durable.
